flavor: The server was quiet that night. I closed my eyes, the low-hum of the datastream lulling me into a trance. When I opened them, the construct stood before me in the shape of a man, clad in light of many colors. His stature was impressive, and his saccharine voice wormed its way into my very soul.
printed_text: Interface → Trash a card from your grip: Break 1 subroutine. Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> Trash a card from your grip: Break 1 subroutine. Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.

printed_text:
When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time).
[trash]: Install 1 card hosted on Street Peddler, lowering its install cost by 1.
stripped_printed_text: When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time). trash: Install 1 card hosted on Street Peddler, lowering its install cost by 1.

printed_text: Whenever you use a [trash] ability, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you use a trash ability, draw 1 card.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Expose 1 card installed in the root of a remote server. If you do and that card is an asset or upgrade, trash it.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Expose 1 card installed in the root of a remote server. If you do and that card is an asset or upgrade, trash it.

flavor: Using the exact same rig as a million other people is just another form of security through anonymity.
printed_text: +1[link] [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 1 tag. [trash]: Remove 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 link Interrupt -> trash: Prevent 1 tag. trash: Remove 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.

printed_text: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface → [trash]: Break up to 3 sentry subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface -> trash: Break up to 3 sentry subroutines.

flavor: Muertos has no fear of the law. Muertos is the law.
printed_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, breach HQ. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ during this breach.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, breach HQ. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ during this breach.

flavor: La Señora de las Sombras giveth and taketh away.
printed_text:
When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card.
When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost.
[trash]: Draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card. When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost. trash: Draw 1 card.

printed_text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.

flavor: "It doesn't actually bend time. It just feels like it. That's relativity." -Hayley Kaplan
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may remove Hyperdriver from the game and gain [click][click][click].
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may remove Hyperdriver from the game and gain click click click.

flavor:
"Isn't this wrong?"
"Not legally. They didn't read the fine print."
printed_text:
Test Ground can be advanced.
[trash]: Derez 1 card for each advancement token on Test Ground.
stripped_printed_text: Test Ground can be advanced. trash: Derez 1 card for each advancement token on Test Ground.

printed_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. [interrupt] → The first time each turn the Runner would suffer core damage, increase that damage by 1.
stripped_printed_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Interrupt -> The first time each turn the Runner would suffer core damage, increase that damage by 1.

Allele Repression can be advanced.
[trash]: Swap 1 card in HQ with 1 card in Archives for each advancement token on Allele Repression.
stripped_printed_text: Allele Repression can be advanced. trash: Swap 1 card in HQ with 1 card in Archives for each advancement token on Allele Repression.

printed_text: [trash]: You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, resolve 1 subroutine on a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, resolve 1 subroutine on a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

flavor: "Is your neighbor secretly a violent criminal? The answer to this chilling question and more, right after the break." -Shannon Claire, SSN 5

Exposé can be advanced.
[trash]: Remove 1 bad publicity for each advancement token on Exposé.

[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.

printed_text:
Install Underway Renovation faceup.

flavor: "You want no questions asked, hire someone else. I have two: who and how much?"
printed_text: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "[click], [trash]: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."
stripped_printed_text: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "click, trash: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."

flavor: "Let me tell you a secret. There's no such thing as impenetrable ice. It has to allow access, or else why is the server on the Network in the first place? But that doesn't mean they have to make it easy." -g00ru
